actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 for purposes of providing that milk shall continue to be supported at not less than 80 per centum of the parity price for milk until October 1, 1981, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to extend from March 31, 1979, through October 1, 1981, the price support of milk at not less than 80 percent of parity.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 for purposes of providing that milk shall continue to be supported at not less than 80 per centum of the parity price for milk until October 1, 1981, and for other purposes.
